DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Parkinson disease ( PD ) accord United Kingdom Brain Bank Criteria , confirm neurologist expertise movement disorder . Minimum 3 year since formal diagnosis PD , require dopaminergic therapy ( minimum , levodopa and/or dopamine agonist therapy ) . On stable dose medication 2 month ; antiPD medication adjustment next 3 month . Age 40 year old . Minimental state examination > 27 . Any history clinical sign severe psychiatric illness ( like major depression , psychosis obsessive compulsive disorder ) . History head injury , stroke , neurologic disease . Organic brain defect T1 T2 image . History seizure unexplained loss consciousness . Implanted pacemaker , medication pump , vagal stimulator , deep brain stimulator . Family history medication refractory epilepsy . History substance abuse within last 6 month .
